channel.title: Fun Computer Games
channel.description: I'm going on a torrent spree, and need ideas for games to download. Already got Amnesia, Roller Coaster Tycoon, Zoo Tycoon, Sims and Age of Empires III and Dawn of the Modern World. Ideas pl0x?(:

Also, I suggest World of Warcraft if you are the type of person that plays a game for a few months and then switches. I had fun getting 2 characters to 85 in WoW, but that was with double XP with refer a friend. Not sure if I could do it with the normal XP rates It was a fun game to play though.
[/quote]if you stopped the day you got the 2nd one to 85, then you would have gotten one 85.[/quote]I didn’t say that though :o

item.title: Fun Computer Games
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:28, topic:449072”][quote author=ox random xi link=topic=551969.msg4049187#msg4049187 date=1342331246]

This just in, ox random xi has the official say in the WoW killer!

Just kidding, it’s not the WoW killer.

did you see the beta plays? What they’re doing? It looks amazing. I think WoW is going to have some REAL compition with this one. TERA, SWTOR, Rift… they’re all the same as WoW so they’re not going to just bump the elder off the top… You need a game changer. It’s here.
[/quote]I watched every single beta play I could find. TotalBiscuit, Yogscast, and a few other big names. I’m not saying it doesn’t look like a big game, I’m saying WoW cannot be killed by a single game.[/quote]
When it’s bringing some new flavor to a game that’s already getting boring for a lot of people, it might hit it hard.
Even with the new expansion, I know they’re trying to go back to Vanilla WoW, I don’t think people even care. I’ve already had veteran WoW players pre-ordering.

Read full topic

Also, I suggest World of Warcraft if you are the type of person that plays a game for a few months and then switches. I had fun getting 2 characters to 85 in WoW, but that was with double XP with refer a friend. Not sure if I could do it with the normal XP rates It was a fun game to play though.

item.title: Fun Computer Games
item.dc:creator: @Mack_n_cheese Mack n cheese
item.description:
@Mack_n_cheese wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:11, topic:449072”][quote author=Mack n cheese link=topic=551969.msg4043974#msg4043974 date=1341911652]
Roller Coaster Tycoon
[/quote]Fuck yea! I remember playing that game. It was usually more fun creating your own scenarios that didn’t have any limits and then just seeing how big you could make your park

Have you tried Sim City 4 (deluxe?) It’s that similar type of tile based tycoon game, and if you enjoy RCT you’ll probably like SC too.[/quote]ya sc was cool, but ended up pissing me off in the end. I used literally ALL clean power sources and my pollution was fucking ridiculous. I had like, no citizens and built way too many buildings. haha so i gave up

Read full topic

item.title: Fun Computer Games
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Mack n cheese, post:1, topic:449072”]Roller Coaster Tycoon[/quote]Fuck yea! I remember playing that game. It was usually more fun creating your own scenarios that didn’t have any limits and then just seeing how big you could make your park

Have you tried Sim City 4 (deluxe?) It’s that similar type of tile based tycoon game, and if you enjoy RCT you’ll probably like SC too.

Read full topic
